quoteText:
We do not allow any third party to place cookies in connection with our services.

We do, however, need to use persistent cookies to identify you, for instance to allow trusted devices (automatic re-login), to store certain preferences and for internal user statistics. We employ encrypted cookies that cannot be used by others.
title: This service requires first-party cookies, which are cookies that only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
